verses.verse: I <S%H589><s%> am the <S%H1397>man<s%> that hath <S%H7200>seen<s%> <S%H6040>affliction<s%> by the <S%H7626>rod<s%> of his <S%H5678>wrath.<s%>
He hath <S%H5090>led<s%> me, and <S%H1980>brought<s%> me into <S%H2822>darkness,<s%> but <S%H3808>not<s%> into <S%H216>light.<s%>
Surely <S%H389><s%> against me is he <S%H7725>turned;<s%> he <S%H2015>turneth<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> against me <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3117>day.<s%>
My <S%H1320>flesh<s%> and my <S%H5785>skin<s%> hath he made <S%H1086>old;<s%> he hath <S%H7665>broken<s%> my <S%H6106>bones.<s%>
He hath <S%H1129>built<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> me, and <S%H5362>compassed<s%> me with <S%H7219>gall<s%> and <S%H8513>travail.<s%>
He hath <S%H3427>set<s%> me in dark <S%H4285>places,<s%> as they that be <S%H4191>dead<s%> of <S%H5769>old.<s%>
He hath <S%H1443>hedged<s%> me <S%H1157>about,<s%> that I <S%H3808>cannot<s%> get <S%H3318>out:<s%> he hath made my chain <S%H3513>heavy.<s%> <S%H5178><s%>
Also <S%H1571><s%> <S%H3588>when<s%> I <S%H2199>cry<s%> and <S%H7768>shout,<s%> he shutteth <S%H5640>out<s%> my <S%H8605>prayer.<s%>
He hath <S%H1443>enclosed<s%> my <S%H1870>ways<s%> with hewn <S%H1496>stone,<s%> he hath made my paths <S%H5753>crooked.<s%> <S%H5410><s%>
He <S%H1931><s%> was unto me as a <S%H1677>bear<s%> lying in <S%H693>wait,<s%> and as a <S%H738>lion<s%> in secret <S%H4565>places.<s%>
He hath turned <S%H5493>aside<s%> my <S%H1870>ways,<s%> and pulled me in <S%H6582>pieces:<s%> he hath <S%H7760>made<s%> me <S%H8074>desolate.<s%>
He hath <S%H1869>bent<s%> his <S%H7198>bow,<s%> and <S%H5324>set<s%> me as a <S%H4307>mark<s%> for the <S%H2671>arrow.<s%>
He hath caused the <S%H1121>arrows<s%> of his <S%H827>quiver<s%> to <S%H935>enter<s%> into my <S%H3629>reins.<s%>
I <S%H1961>was<s%> a <S%H7814>derision<s%> to <S%H3605>all<s%> my <S%H5971>people;<s%> and their <S%H5058>song<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3117>day.<s%>
He hath <S%H7646>filled<s%> me with <S%H4844>bitterness,<s%> he hath made me <S%H7301>drunken<s%> with <S%H3939>wormwood.<s%>
He hath also <S%H1638>broken<s%> my <S%H8127>teeth<s%> with gravel <S%H2687>stones,<s%> he hath <S%H3728>covered<s%> me with <S%H665>ashes.<s%>
And thou hast removed my soul far <S%H2186>off<s%> <S%H5315><s%> from <S%H4480>peace:<s%> <S%H7965><s%> I <S%H5382>forgot<s%> <S%H2896>prosperity.<s%>
And I <S%H559>said,<s%> My <S%H5331>strength<s%> and my <S%H8431>hope<s%> is <S%H6>perished<s%> from the <S%H4480>LORD:<s%> <S%H3068><s%>
Remembering <S%H2142><s%> mine <S%H6040>affliction<s%> and my <S%H4788>misery,<s%> the <S%H3939>wormwood<s%> and the <S%H7219>gall.<s%>
My <S%H5315>soul<s%> hath them still in <S%H2142>remembrance,<s%> <S%H2142><s%> and is <S%H7743>humbled<s%> <S%H5921>in<s%> me.
This <S%H2063><s%> I <S%H7725>recall<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> my <S%H3820>mind,<s%> <S%H5921>therefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> have I <S%H3176>hope.<s%>

It is of the <S%H3068>LORD's<s%> <S%H2617>mercies<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> we are <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H8552>consumed,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> his <S%H7356>compassions<s%> <S%H3615>fail<s%> <S%H3808>not.<s%>
They are <S%H2319>new<s%> every <S%H1242>morning:<s%> <S%H7227>great<s%> is thy <S%H530>faithfulness.<s%>
The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> is my <S%H2506>portion,<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> my <S%H5315>soul;<s%> <S%H5921>therefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> will I <S%H3176>hope<s%> in him.
The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> is <S%H2896>good<s%> unto them that wait <S%H6960>for<s%> him, to the <S%H5315>soul<s%> that <S%H1875>seeketh<s%> him.
It is <S%H2896>good<s%> that a man should both <S%H3175>hope<s%> and quietly <S%H1748>wait<s%> for the <S%H8668>salvation<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>
It is <S%H2896>good<s%> for a <S%H1397>man<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> he <S%H5375>bear<s%> the <S%H5923>yoke<s%> in his <S%H5271>youth.<s%>
He <S%H3427>sitteth<s%> <S%H910>alone<s%> and keepeth <S%H1826>silence,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> he hath <S%H5190>borne<s%> it <S%H5921>upon<s%> him.
He <S%H5414>putteth<s%> his <S%H6310>mouth<s%> in the <S%H6083>dust;<s%> if so <S%H194>be<s%> there may <S%H3426>be<s%> <S%H8615>hope.<s%>
He <S%H5414>giveth<s%> his <S%H3895>cheek<s%> to him that <S%H5221>smiteth<s%> him: he is filled <S%H7646>full<s%> with <S%H2781>reproach.<s%>
For <S%H3588><s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> will <S%H3808>not<s%> cast <S%H2186>off<s%> forever: <S%H5769><s%>
But <S%H3588><s%> <S%H518>though<s%> he cause <S%H3013>grief,<s%> yet will he have <S%H7355>compassion<s%> according to the <S%H7230>multitude<s%> of his <S%H2617>mercies.<s%>
For <S%H3588><s%> he doth <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H6031>afflict<s%> <S%H4480>willingly<s%> <S%H3820><s%> nor <S%H3013>grieve<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H376>men.<s%>
To <S%H1792>crush<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> his <S%H7272>feet<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H615>prisoners<s%> of the <S%H776>earth,<s%>
To turn <S%H5186>aside<s%> the <S%H4941>right<s%> of a <S%H1397>man<s%> <S%H5048>before<s%> the <S%H6440>face<s%> of the most <S%H5945>High,<s%>
To <S%H5791>subvert<s%> a <S%H120>man<s%> in his <S%H7379>cause,<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H7200>approveth<s%> <S%H3808>not.<s%>
Who <S%H4310><s%> is <S%H2088>he<s%> that <S%H559>saith,<s%> and it cometh to <S%H1961>pass,<s%> when the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H6680>commandeth<s%> it <S%H3808>not?<s%>
Out of the <S%H4480>mouth<s%> <S%H6310><s%> of the most <S%H5945>High<s%> <S%H3318>proceedeth<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> and <S%H2896>good?<s%>
Wherefore <S%H4100><s%> doth a <S%H2416>living<s%> <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H596>complain,<s%> a <S%H1397>man<s%> <S%H5921>for<s%> the punishment of his <S%H2399>sins?<s%>
Let us <S%H2664>search<s%> and <S%H2713>try<s%> our <S%H1870>ways,<s%> and turn <S%H7725>again<s%> <S%H5704>to<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>
Let us lift <S%H5375>up<s%> our <S%H3824>heart<s%> <S%H413>with<s%> our <S%H3709>hands<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H410>God<s%> in the <S%H8064>heavens.<s%>
We <S%H5168><s%> have <S%H6586>transgressed<s%> and have <S%H4784>rebelled:<s%> <S%H859>thou<s%> hast <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H5545>pardoned.<s%>
Thou hast <S%H5526>covered<s%> with <S%H639>anger,<s%> and <S%H7291>persecuted<s%> us: thou hast <S%H2026>slain,<s%> thou hast <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H2550>pitied.<s%>
Thou hast <S%H5526>covered<s%> thyself with a <S%H6051>cloud,<s%> that our <S%H8605>prayer<s%> should not pass <S%H4480>through.<s%> <S%H5674><s%>
Thou hast <S%H7760>made<s%> us as the <S%H5501>offscouring<s%> and <S%H3973>refuse<s%> in the <S%H7130>midst<s%> of the <S%H5971>people.<s%>
All <S%H3605><s%> our <S%H341>enemies<s%> have <S%H6475>opened<s%> their <S%H6310>mouths<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> us.
Fear <S%H6343><s%> and a <S%H6354>snare<s%> is <S%H1961>come<s%> upon us, <S%H7612>desolation<s%> and <S%H7667>destruction.<s%>
Mine <S%H5869>eye<s%> runneth <S%H3381>down<s%> with <S%H6388>rivers<s%> of <S%H4325>water<s%> <S%H5921>for<s%> the <S%H7667>destruction<s%> of the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of my <S%H5971>people.<s%>
Mine <S%H5869>eye<s%> trickleth <S%H5064>down,<s%> and <S%H1820>ceaseth<s%> <S%H3808>not,<s%> without <S%H4480>any<s%> <S%H369><s%> <S%H2014>intermission,<s%>
Till <S%H5704><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> look <S%H8259>down,<s%> and <S%H7200>behold<s%> from <S%H4480>heaven.<s%> <S%H8064><s%>
Mine <S%H5869>eye<s%> <S%H5953>affecteth<s%> mine <S%H5315>heart<s%> because of <S%H4480>all<s%> <S%H3605><s%> the <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of my <S%H5892>city.<s%>
Mine <S%H341>enemies<s%> chased me <S%H6679>sore,<s%> <S%H6679><s%> like a <S%H6833>bird,<s%> without <S%H2600>cause.<s%>
They have cut <S%H6789>off<s%> my <S%H2416>life<s%> in the <S%H953>dungeon,<s%> and <S%H3034>cast<s%> a <S%H68>stone<s%> upon me.
Waters <S%H4325><s%> <S%H6687>flowed<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> mine <S%H7218>head;<s%> then I <S%H559>said,<s%> I am cut <S%H1504>off.<s%>
I called <S%H7121>upon<s%> thy <S%H8034>name,<s%> O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> out of the low <S%H4480>dungeon.<s%> <S%H953><s%> <S%H8482><s%>
Thou hast <S%H8085>heard<s%> my <S%H6963>voice:<s%> <S%H5956>hide<s%> <S%H408>not<s%> thine <S%H241>ear<s%> at my <S%H7309>breathing,<s%> at my <S%H7775>cry.<s%>
Thou drewest <S%H7126>near<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> that I called <S%H7121>upon<s%> thee: thou <S%H559>saidst,<s%> <S%H3372>Fear<s%> <S%H408>not.<s%>
O <S%H136>Lord,<s%> thou hast <S%H7378>pleaded<s%> the <S%H7379>causes<s%> of my <S%H5315>soul;<s%> thou hast <S%H1350>redeemed<s%> my <S%H2416>life.<s%>
O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> thou hast <S%H7200>seen<s%> my <S%H5792>wrong:<s%> <S%H8199>judge<s%> thou my <S%H4941>cause.<s%>
Thou hast <S%H7200>seen<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H5360>vengeance<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H4284>imaginations<s%> against me.
Thou hast <S%H8085>heard<s%> their <S%H2781>reproach,<s%> O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H4284>imaginations<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> me;
The <S%H8193>lips<s%> of those that rose up <S%H6965>against<s%> me, and their <S%H1902>device<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> me <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3117>day.<s%>
Behold <S%H5027><s%> their sitting <S%H3427>down,<s%> and their rising <S%H7012>up;<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> am their <S%H4485>music.<s%>
Render <S%H7725><s%> unto them a <S%H1576>recompense,<s%> O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> according to the <S%H4639>work<s%> of their <S%H3027>hands.<s%>
Give <S%H5414><s%> them <S%H4044>sorrow<s%> of <S%H3820>heart,<s%> thy <S%H8381>curse<s%> unto them.
Persecute <S%H7291><s%> and <S%H8045>destroy<s%> them in <S%H639>anger<s%> from <S%H4480>under<s%> <S%H8478><s%> the <S%H8064>heavens<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>
